author: Maggie Fitzgerald
title: Every major analyst loves SmileDirectClub shares even after IPO tanks
description: Eight major Wall Street firms initiated coverage of SmileDirectClub on Monday with buy ratings, despite the stock being down 36% since its initial public offering.
content:
Wall Street loves SmileDirectClub but the stock's performance is not something to smile about.
Eight major Wall Street firms initiated coverage of the newly-public teeth-straightening start-up on Monday with buy ratings and rave reviews, despite the stock's … [+3126 chars]
